male.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: typical of or relating to men or boys
male.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Motor-racing has largely been a male preserve (=something that only men have been involved with).
male.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a male person or animal cannot have babies or lay eggs
male.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: Many women earn less than their male colleagues.
male.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a male plant or flower cannot produce fruit
male.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a male plug has parts that stick out and that fit into a hole or socket
male.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The male is usually bigger and more brightly coloured than the female.
male.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: Police described her attacker as a white male aged about 25.
